arts.ttl: Ekitike's Anfield debut & Nunez's future - Liverpool wins vs Athletic Club assessed
arts.sum: Liverpool secured back-to-back wins in a friendly double header against Athletic Club at Anfield on Monday. Here we examine some of the big talking points from their performance...

arts.ttl: Ngumoha shines, Ekitike assists - Liverpool impress in Athletic Club double-header
arts.sum: Teenage star Rio Nguhoma continued to impress and Hugo Ekitike registered his first assist as Liverpool secured 4-1 and 3-2 wins in back-to-back friendlies against Athletic Club at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Liverpool new boys impress before Cody Gakpo steals the show vs Bilbao - 5 talking points
arts.sum: LIVERPOOL 3-2 ATHLETIC BILBAO: Cody Gakpo scored twice at the right end and once at the wrong one as Liverpool ran out winners over Athletic Bilbao in their second match of the night

arts.ttl: Liverpool Player Ratings vs. Athletic Club: Ngumoha Steals Show in 4-1 Thrashing
arts.sum: The scorer turned provider shortly thereafter when Ngumoah headed a ball into a dangerous area that Darwin Núñez calmly slotted into the Athletic Club goal. Youngster Rio Ngumoha got the Anfield crowd on their feet early with a stunning strike from outside the box to open the scoring.

arts.ttl: Ngumoha and Doak shine as Liverpool cruise to victory vs Athletic Club
arts.sum: Liverpool's teenage sensation Rio Ngumoha impressed again as Liverpool beat Athletic Club 4-1 in the first of two back-to-back friendlies at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-1 Athletic Club: Pre-Season Player Ratings and Match Highlights
arts.sum: Liverpool scored four as they beat Athletic Club in the first of their two pre-season friendlies, as Rio Ngumoha stole the show.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Anfield evacuated ahead of Liverpool vs Athletic Bilbao friendly double-header
arts.sum: Fans have been asked to leave Anfield after an alarm sounded ahead of Liverpool's friendly double-header against Athletic Bilbao this evening

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Athletic Club LIVE: Friendly double header match stream, latest team news, lineups, TV, prediction
arts.sum: The Reds are into their final 180 minutes of pre-season football
